definition[0]: used to say that you do not know why someone likes someone else

definition[1]: to notice a particular quality in someone or something that makes you like them
example[1]: He saw a gentleness in Susan.
definition[2]: to go with someone to make sure they arrive at a building or room
example[2]: He took her home and, after seeing her in, drove off without a word.
definition[3]: to celebrate the beginning of a new year
